sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_appn">
    <x_snc_nnemc0_appn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <appn_code>RDT&E</appn_code>
        <appn_desc>RDT&E funds are used for expenses and investments for the development of a new system,
such as basic and applied research, advanced technology development, demonstration and
validation, engineering development, developmental and operational testing, and evaluation
of test results. The cost of operation of dedicated research and development installations
and activities are also appropriated under RDT&E. This appropriation is a multi-year
appropriation and remains available for obligation for two fiscal years; however, RDT&E
follows an incremental funding policy and is budgeted to cover the costs expected to be
incurred during a 12-month period. </appn_desc>
        <appn_type>Research, Development, Test and Evaluation</appn_type>
        <number>APPN0001006</number>
        <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_appn</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 15:04:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>cfbee75adb1d23008e9357935e96195b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 15:04:19</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_nnemc0_appn>
</record_update>
